title: PhysicsLab Common Definitions
description: Shared building blocks for PhysicsLab manifests and profiles.

identifier.description: Stable id using lowercase letters, numbers, dashes, or underscores.

version.description: Semantic-ish version tag for schema and content records.

asset_ref.description: Path to an asset relative to the module root.

schema_ref.description: Schema URI or relative path (no spaces).

x_extensions.description: Optional vendor or site-specific fields that are not interpreted by the core schemas.

details.description: Free-form container for diagnostic or debugging payloads.
